mapper.select: select * from docs where name = #{name} and categoryID = #{categoryID}
mapper.insert: insert into docs(name,categoryID,owner, size, file, createdAt) values( #{name}, #{categoryID}, #{owner}, #{size}, #{file},now())
mapper.update: update docs set name = #{name}, categoryID = #{categoryID}, owner = #{owner}, size= #{size}, file= #{file}, updatedAt = now() where id = #{id}
